Calculator Application

Our calculator application provides an intuitive and efficient tool for performing basic mathematical operations. The interface is simple and user-friendly, encompassing all the essential functions needed for everyday calculations.

Key Features:

Clear Display Area:

Results and input are shown in a spacious display area, ensuring clarity and readability during use.
Simple Button Layout:

Buttons are designed as rounded shapes with soft colors, providing a comfortable visual experience and easy clickability.
Common mathematical operators (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) and number buttons (0-9) are prominently displayed.
Function Buttons:

AC (All Clear): One-click to clear all input and results, allowing for a quick reset.
Enter: Performs the calculation and displays the result, supporting standard mathematical expressions.
Number and Operator Buttons: Includes all basic digits (0-9) and operators (+, -, *, /).
Input and Calculation:

Supports direct input of mathematical expressions via button clicks or keyboard input.
The display area updates in real-time, providing immediate feedback and ensuring users understand their current input.
Responsive Design:

Adapts to various screen sizes, ensuring a consistent appearance and functionality across different devices.
Style and Design:

Utilizes a minimalist visual style with modern design elements, such as circular buttons and subtle shadow effects, to ensure a friendly and easy-to-use interface.
This calculator application combines elegant aesthetics with comprehensive functionality, making it suitable for both basic arithmetic and more complex mathematical expressions with ease.
